pages.text: A demonic Rite used as protection or traps.$(br)By creating a modified form of a Warp Point held under tension, one can allow burning horrors from the Infernal Kingdom to enter this reality $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro#triggered_rites)$(t:->Triggered Rites)$(marked)once a living being passes nearby the Rite$(), or upon simple activation. It will release waves of these demonic monsters to destroy those nearby.
